sentences.en: a high old time of it we all had.
sentences.cn: 我们都玩得非常开心。

sentences.en: A high turnout was reported at the polling booths.
sentences.cn: 来自投票站的消息称投票率很高。

sentences.en: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.cn: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.en: At my brother's high school graduation the students recited a poem.
sentences.cn: 在我弟弟的高中毕业典礼上，学生们朗诵了一首诗。

sentences.en: Bank base rates of 7 per cent are too high.
sentences.cn: 7%的银行基准利率太高了。

sentences.en: He could refer the matter to the high court.
sentences.cn: 他可以将此事交由高等法院裁决。

sentences.en: He kicked the ball high into the air, over the heads of the crowd.
sentences.cn: 他把球高高地踢向空中，越过了人群。

sentences.en: He was a high-earning broker with money to burn.
sentences.cn: 他是高收入的经纪人，有花不完的钱。

sentences.en: High winds have knocked down trees and power lines.
sentences.cn: 大风刮倒了树木和电线。

sentences.en: How high is the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.cn: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

sentences.en: I think you're a bit too high and mighty yourself.
sentences.cn: 我认为你自己就有些过于盛气凌人。

sentences.en: If cancers are spotted early, there's a high chance of survival.
sentences.cn: 如果癌症在早期发现的话，存活的几率会很高。

sentences.en: if he turns it down, he will have lost the moral high ground to the president.
sentences.cn: 如果他拒绝的话，就会把精神上的优势输给总裁。

sentences.en: it was high time that she faced facts.
sentences.cn: 早该是她面对事实的时候了。

sentences.en: Most of the refugees are camped high in the mountains.
sentences.cn: 多数难民在高山上露宿。

sentences.en: searched high and low for the keys.
sentences.cn: 到处找钥匙

sentences.en: Several of the delays were caused by the new high-tech baggage system.
sentences.cn: 几次延误都是由新的高科技行李传送系统造成的。

sentences.en: She has always had a high reputation for her excellent short stories.
sentences.cn: 她一直因其优秀的短篇小说享有很高的声望。

sentences.en: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.cn: 海滩上有些地方在涨潮时完全淹没在水中。

sentences.en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
sentences.cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

sentences.en: the accursed high and mighty elite.
sentences.cn: 可恶的自以为了不起的精英分子。

sentences.en: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.cn: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.en: The hotel is set plumb in the middle of the high street.
sentences.cn: 宾馆正好坐落在商街的中段。

sentences.en: The meeting had all the ingredients of high political drama.
sentences.cn: 这次会议具备了作为高度戏剧性的政治事件的一切要素。

sentences.en: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.cn: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.en: went off and left me high and dry.
sentences.cn: 都走掉了只剩下我无依无靠

words.tran_cn: 更高的，较高的（high的比较级）
高度地；非常；非常赞许地
提高；增高；加强；使更显著
高水平；天空；由麻醉品引起的快感；高压地带

phrases.phrase: ace (或 king或 queen 等) high
phrases.tran_cn: （纸牌游戏中）A牌（或老K、王后等指定的纸牌）最大
&I{【航海】} 搁浅：在水域之外。例如用于船只
有权有势的，趾高气扬的
（河流）水满的，高涨的；水流湍急的
（源于军事冲突）优势地位，优越位置

trans.tran_cn: 高的，高度为…的，富含…的，重要的，显赫的，先进的，全盛的，不新鲜的，崇高的，兴奋的，有醉意的
trans.tran_en: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
at or to a level high above the ground, the floor etc

trans.tran_cn: 最高点，反气旋，兴奋，学校名
trans.tran_en: the highest price, number, temperature etc that has ever been recorded, or that has been recorded within a particular period of time
measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
